name: Sleeping Delivery
description:
[We deliver you a sweet sleep.]

A girl who cannot sleep from her nightmares,
and the 5 Delivery Agents to help her fall asleep.

Who will you choose as your Delivery Agent?

"I want to help you fall asleep."
Kind Delivery Agent, Julian Parker.


"Call me or whatever, if you need me."
Tsun-dere Delivery Agent, Luke Morris.


"It's a business, after all."
Stiff Delivery Agent,


"I'll be here, so don't be afraid."
Cute Delivery Agent,


And…
A special Delivery Agent visiting you,
after you've met all 4 Delivery Agents!

A sleepless night…
A special service, just for you.
